definition: to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The so-called knowledge should be about that stone.
sentences.chinese: 所谓赏石学问应当就是讲这个的。

sentences.english: In order to enjoy a stone amateur achievement watching, collection platform.
sentences.chinese: 为赏石爱好者成就一处观赏，收藏的平台。

definition: scholar's rock (one of the naturally-eroded, fantastically-shaped rocks put on display indoors or in gardens in China)
a type of clay found in the region of Yixing 宜興|宜兴[Yi2 xing1], used to make Yixing stoneware, with its distinctive russet or dark purple coloring
a rubbing from a stone inscription
